name: spark
title: Spark
desc: A powerful multilingual Astro starter theme featuring Alpine.js, MDX, sitemap generation, and Tailwind for rapid, responsive, and dynamic web development.
article:
This Astro starter theme is designed for developers looking to create fast, multilingual websites with ease.


Built with Alpine.js for lightweight interactivity, MDX for content-driven components, and Tailwind for customizable and responsive design. It also includes built-in sitemap generation, making it SEO-friendly and ready for production.


So, whether you're building a blog, a portfolio, or a complex site, this theme offers flexibility and performance, all while supporting multiple languages.
